goals__remit:
AG Animationsfilm -  German Animation Association  
 
AG Animationsfilm represents many different people working in animation like animators, producers, storyboarders and filmmakers from all over Germany. The association was founded in 2011 to support the independent animation scene and raise awareness for the art and necessity of animation in German society and German media. They also represent the interests of the German animation scene in regards of national and European media politics.
